body:
Comment 1: 
The crash is not reproducible with the latest, updated code base (different
doc/codelab/wiki/final-noclosure.go). Here's a simple example the exposes the problem
though:

gofmt -r 'struct { a string; b []byte } -> struct { A string }' crash.go

with crash.go:

package p

type S struct {
	a string
	b []byte
}
